mapper.sql: id, hotel_id, hotel_name, city_code, city_name, order_id, order_type, begin_time, end_time, total_price, service_cost, rule_code, spread_user, invalid_reason, checkin_time, prepayment_discount, to_pay_discount, order_create_time, bill_time, settlement_price, user_cost, available_money, ticket_money, wechat_pay_money, ali_pay_money, promo_id, b_bill_order_week_id, create_time, update_time, room_type_name, room_no, day_number
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from b_bill_order_detail
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into b_bill_order_detail (id, hotel_id, hotel_name, city_code, city_name, order_id, order_type, begin_time, end_time, total_price, service_cost, rule_code, spread_user, invalid_reason, checkin_time, prepayment_discount, to_pay_discount, order_create_time, bill_time, settlement_price, user_cost, available_money, ticket_money, wechat_pay_money, ali_pay_money, promo_id, b_bill_order_week_id, create_time, update_time, room_type_name, room_no, day_number) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hotelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hotelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{serviceCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ruleCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spreadUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{invalidReason,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checkinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{prepaymentDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{toPayDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{billTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{settlementPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{availableMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ticketMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{wechatPayMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{aliPayMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{promoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bBillOrderWeekId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{roomTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dayNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update b_bill_order_detail
hotel_id = #{hotelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
hotel_name = #{hotelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=BIGINT},
begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
service_cost = #{serviceCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rule_code = #{ruleCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
spread_user = #{spreadUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
invalid_reason = #{invalidReason,jdbcType=INTEGER},
checkin_time = #{checkinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
prepayment_discount = #{prepaymentDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
to_pay_discount = #{toPayDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
order_create_time = #{orderCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
bill_time = #{billTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
settlement_price = #{settlementPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
user_cost = #{userCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
available_money = #{availableMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ticket_money = #{ticketMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
wechat_pay_money = #{wechatPayMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ali_pay_money = #{aliPayMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
promo_id = #{promoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
b_bill_order_week_id = #{bBillOrderWeekId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
room_type_name = #{roomTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room_no = #{roomNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
day_number = #{dayNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update b_bill_order_detail set hotel_id = #{hotelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, hotel_name = #{hotelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, service_cost = #{serviceCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rule_code = #{ruleCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, spread_user = #{spreadUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, invalid_reason = #{invalidReason,jdbcType=INTEGER}, checkin_time = #{checkinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, prepayment_discount = #{prepaymentDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, to_pay_discount = #{toPayDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_create_time = #{orderCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bill_time = #{billTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, settlement_price = #{settlementPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, user_cost = #{userCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, available_money = #{availableMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ticket_money = #{ticketMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, wechat_pay_money = #{wechatPayMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ali_pay_money = #{aliPayMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, promo_id = #{promoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, b_bill_order_week_id = #{bBillOrderWeekId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, room_type_name = #{roomTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_no = #{roomNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, day_number = #{dayNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into b_bill_order_detail (id, hotel_id, hotel_name, city_code, city_name, order_id, order_type, begin_time, end_time, total_price, service_cost, rule_code, spread_user, invalid_reason, checkin_time, prepayment_discount, to_pay_discount, order_create_time, bill_time, settlement_price, user_cost, available_money, ticket_money, wechat_pay_money, ali_pay_money, promo_id, b_bill_order_week_id, create_time, update_time, room_type_name, room_no, day_number) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.hotelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.hotelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.orderType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.serviceCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.ruleCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.spreadUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.invalidReason,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.checkinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.prepaymentDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.toPayDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.orderCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.billTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.settlementPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.userCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.availableMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.ticketMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.wechatPayMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.aliPayMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.promoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.bBillOrderWeekId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.roomTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.roomNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dayNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: SELECT o.id orderid, o.HotelId hotelid, o.Hotelname hotelname, o.cityCode cityCode, o.daynumber, o.daynumber, o.Updatetime, o.Ordertype, o.Begintime, o.Endtime, o.TotalPrice, o.rulecode, o.spreadUser, o.Invalidreason, o.availablemoney, o.OrderStatus orderstatus, o.Paystatus paystatus, o.Createtime orderCreatetime, o.promotype promotype, ro.RoomTypeName, ro.roomno, ro.RoomTypeName, ro.promoid, bpp.promotion isPromotion, bpp.price ticketMoney, ox.checkintime checkintime FROM b_otaorder o LEFT JOIN b_otaroomorder ro ON o.id = ro.OtaOrderId LEFT JOIN b_pmsroomorder ox ON ro.PMSRoomOrderNo = ox.PmsRoomOrderNo AND ro.Hotelid = ox.Hotelid LEFT JOIN b_promotion_price bpp ON o.id = bpp.otaorderid WHERE o.updatetime >= #{beginTime}# AND o.updatetime < #{endTime}# AND o.orderstatus in (180,190,200,520) AND o.paystatus = 120 AND o.promoType = 0 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM b_bill_order_detail WHERE o.id = b_bill_order_detail.order_id ) order by o.id desc LIMIT #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}

SELECT o.id AS orderid, p.lezhu as lezhu, ol.payid AS payid, ol.realallcost AS allcost, ol.hotelgive AS hotelgive, ol.otagive AS otagive, ol.realcost AS usercost, ol.realotagive AS realotagive, ol.qiekeIncome AS qiekeIncome, pinfo.otherType onlinePayType FROM b_otaorder o LEFT JOIN p_pay p ON o.id = p.orderid LEFT JOIN p_orderlog ol ON p.id = ol.payid LEFT JOIN p_payinfo pinfo on p.id = pinfo.payid and pinfo.otherType in(1,2,3) WHERE o.id = #{orderId}
